name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control
display_help: You can call forth and control the power of plants and flora to control your foes. Animate and control vines, roots and spores to entrap, entwine and utterly dominate your foes. Many Plant Control powers are only effective if the target is near the ground.

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Entangle
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize

display_info: 5 ticks of 3.06 smashing damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 3.06 lethal damage over 9.2s on target
4.0 immobilize for 27.94s on target
5 ticks of 6.12 lethal damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Strangler
powers.display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling them with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while they is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 3.0 hold for 22.35s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Roots
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Spore_Burst
powers.display_help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around them. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 3.0 sleep for 22.35s on target
20.00% chance for 1.0 sleep for 11.17s on target
4.0 sleep for 4s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Seeds_of_Confusion
powers.display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 60° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: 3.0 confuse for 37.25s on target
20.00% chance for 1.0 confuse for 18.63s on target
3.0 confuse for 4s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Spirit_Tree
powers.display_help: You can tap into the elusive and powerful energy of the World Tree and extract a Spirit Tree at a targeted location. The Sprit Tree is immobile, but possesses incredible regenerative powers. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Spirit Tree. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Vines
powers.display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Long

display_info: 3.0 hold for 14.9s on target
20.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 7.45s on target
4.0 hold for 4s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Carrion_Creepers
powers.display_help: You can create a Creeper patch at a targeted location. The patch will snag foes, slowing their movement, and preventing them from jumping or flying. Additionally, a Creeper Vine will burst from under each live and defeated foe in the area and start attacking your enemies. Creeper Vines do minimal damage, but they can knock down your enemies and its poisonous thorns can slow your foes. Any foes that are defeated in the Creeper patch will also produce a growth of Entangle Roots that will Immobilize any enemies near the defeated foe. Recharge: Very Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Plant_Control.Fly_Trap
powers.display_help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special
